seed_pair.known: I don't want to give it to him.

S0231: I know an old man who wanted to ask for help.
我认识一个想寻求帮助的老男人。
S0232: I know an old woman who can remember the answer.
我认识一个能记住答案的老女人。
S0233: I know a young woman who knows your sister.
我认识一个认识你妹妹的年轻女人。
S0234: I met someone last night who works with your brother.
我昨晚遇到一个和你弟弟一起工作的人。
S0235: I met someone who said that he wanted to tell you something.
我遇到一个说他想告诉你一些事情的人。
S0236: I know someone who said that she was going to try to help.
我认识一个说她会努力帮助的人。
said that she was going to
was going to try to help
S0237: He wanted me to tell you before the weekend.
他想让我在周末之前告诉你。
S0238: He wanted you to tell me yesterday.
S0240: My father doesn't like to stop talking.
我爸爸不喜欢停止说话。

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences

_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
